Welcome to **bupaR docs**. All information you need to use the **bupaverse** packages you can find here, organized along 6 different topics: Install, Create, Manipulate, Analyse, Visualize and Predict. 


```{r echo = F, message = F, warning = F}
library(readr)
library(purrr)

read_csv("cards.csv") %>%
    mutate(card = pmap(list(class, head, body, icon, href), ~card(card_header(class = ..1, ..2), 
                                                       card_image(..4, href = ..5)))) -> cards

layout_column_wrap(cards$card[1], cards$card[2], cards$card[3],
                   cards$card[4], cards$card[5], cards$card[6], width = "125px")
```

<br/>

Alternatively, you can directly consult the documentation of individual packages using the Package Guid on the top right, or have a look at the [FAQ](faq.html).
